emailTemplateUser:
You will receive an email in the next xx hours

Your request will be checked in the next xx hours and you will then receive an email to confirm that you have supplied all the information needed or to ask you to provide more details.

What happens next

After you have provided all the necessary details, it takes up to 30 days to complete a request. Asking for an update during this time may mean it takes longer to get the information you want. 

Receiving personal information

Your request is protected by the Data Protection Act which means the information is confidential.
name: Request personal information
phaseText: This is a new service - your [feedback](https://eu.surveymonkey.com/r/G5SWVCT) will help us to improve it.
